arts.ttl: Atalanta Manager Inconsolable After Heartbreaking Napoli Defeat
arts.sum: Atalanta slumped to a late 3-2 home defeat to Serie A pacesetters Napoli on Saturday evening, losing potentially crucial ground in the Scudetto race. Romelu Lukaku's towering header in the 78th minute saw Antonio Conte's side avenge a 3-0 defeat in November's reverse fixture and steer seven points clear of third-placed La Dea. The post Atalanta Manager Inconsolable After Heartbreaking Napoli Defeat appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: New Balance Back in the Kit Game - Sign Leverkusen and Atalanta
arts.sum: New Balance seems determined to get back into the football kit game as they will become the shirt maker for two new big teams in the 25-26 season, Bayer Leverkusen and Atalanta.

arts.ttl: Antonio Conte Outlines Napoli Transfer Plans After Kvaratskhelia Exit
arts.sum: Napoli enjoyed a dream start to life after Khvicha Kvaratskhelia, beating direct Scudetto rivals Atalanta 3-2 at the Gewiss Stadium last night. Antonio Conte's side overhauled an early deficit to steer seven points clear of the third-placed La Dea and temporarily open a six-point gap on runners-up Inter. The post Antonio Conte Outlines Napoli Transfer Plans After Kvaratskhelia Exit appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.

arts.ttl: Atalanta’s Kossounou Undergoes Successful Tendon Surgery: Recovery Timeline Revealed
arts.sum: Atalanta defender Odilon Kossounou has successfully undergone surgery following a tendon injury in his right adductor. The operation, performed on Friday, marks the beginning of the player's rehabilitation process as he aims to return to action under manager Gian Piero Gasperini. The post Atalanta’s Kossounou Undergoes Successful Tendon Surgery: Recovery Timeline Revealed appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Napoli’s Victory Over Atalanta: Conte Reflects on Team Growth and Future Plans
arts.sum: Antonio Conte celebrated a thrilling 3-2 victory for Napoli against Atalanta, a crucial match that solidified their position at the top of the Serie A standings. After the game, Conte shared his thoughts with Sky, emphasizing the growth of his team despite facing challenges. The post Napoli’s Victory Over Atalanta: Conte Reflects on Team Growth and Future Plans appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Atalanta’s Gasperini Struggles to Accept Defeat Against Napoli
arts.sum: Atalanta coach Gian Piero Gasperini expressed his frustration following a narrow 3-2 defeat at home to Napoli. The post Atalanta’s Gasperini Struggles to Accept Defeat Against Napoli appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Napoli underlines Serie A title chance with comeback victory over Atalanta
arts.sum: Tim Weah scored against his father’s former club as Juventus beat AC Milan 2-0 to inflict Sérgio Conceição’s first loss as the Rossoneri coach. Antonio Conte’s side won 3-2 at Atalanta, which hadn’t lost since September, and moved six points clear of second-placed Inter Milan.
